summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Mayor to execute agreements for financial assistance for the North 46th Street UAB project, Mercer Street UAB project, 7th Avenue Northeast UAB project, 5th Avenue, et al UAB project and 6th Avenue, et al UAB project; accepting the money when received; authorizing the hiring of consultants; and making appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating and Arterial City Street Funds, therefor.
